article.aside: A small fix for some clients who aren't smart enough to resend HTTP OPTIONS after receiving a code 403 for the same. Fitted the XML (CalDAV, DAV, etc.) parser with proper namespace support via the libexpat namespace handlers. Parsed documents are now properly checked for namespace and name of matching elements (e.g., DAV::href), not just the name itself. Also run the XML parsing routines through AFL for quite some time to shake out stray bugs.
